ygData.subject: h3 rest api, copy job

i think that the "Copy Job" API uri reported in the wiki is wrong

wrong: h=
ttps://(heritrixhost):8443/engine/(jobname)
right: https://(heritrixhost):8=
443/engine/job/(jobname)

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix=
/Heritrix+3.0+API+Guide#Heritrix3.0APIGuide-CopyJob


furthermore, it will =
be useful to say in the documentation that with the PUT method
you could up=
load anything in the job directory, not only a cxml profile

https://webarc=
hive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+3.0+API+Guide#Heritrix3.0APIGu=
ide-SubmittingaCXMLJobConfigurationFile

for creating new jobs, i do (simpl=
y with bash and curl)
- copy a profile to a new job. profile has org.archiv=
e.modules.seeds.TextSeedModule to seeds.txt
- PUT seeds.txt to the job
- la=
unch


ciao
